name: Touhou Ice Skating
description:
Submission to Touhou jam 10, theme being "Winter Games", that lasted 3 days.

I started completely clueless about Touhou, but after consulting with a friend... well... still clueless but at least we decided to have Cirno ice skate around her lake. It also helped that she's really easy to model compared to other characters x)

Like always, I made pretty much everything that is visual (3D models, textures, animations...), with a few exceptions:

Allsky Free (Skybox)

Lowpoly Water Shader (Water)

textures.com (Environment textures)

Adventure Creator (Gameplay)

Freesound (SFX)

Special thank you for SuitePea, who composed the music: 

https://soundcloud.com/suite-pea

You can play either in the browser directly, or download the game (the downloaded game has extra post processing effects).

Game details:

Falling in water resets the game.

Getting all the collectables gives Cirno a pair of cool sunglasses.

I hope you'll enjoy skating around the very small lake.
